sentences.en: An auctioneer rouped the kirk seats beginning by asking for a bid.
sentences.cn: 拍卖者叫价以开始拍卖教会的坐椅.

sentences.en: An auctioneer, at the moment of non - sale, should be required to state plainly to his audience that an item has been bought in.
sentences.cn: 遇到无销路时, 拍卖人必须向观众明确表示他已经买回自己送去的拍卖品.

sentences.en: Benson signaled the auctioneer quietly and kicked the bid up another thousand dollars.
sentences.cn: 本森悄悄地向拍卖人做了个手势,然后把出价又抬高了1000美元.

sentences.en: Benson signalled the auctioneer quietly and kicked the bid up another thousand.
sentences.cn: 本森悄悄地向拍卖人做了个手势,然后把出价又抬高了一千元.

sentences.en: He called my name; The auctioneer called the bids.
sentences.cn: 他呼叫我的名字; 拍卖人呼叫投标.

sentences.en: He tried to pass off a false Dagas on the auctioneer.
sentences.cn: 他试着把假的德加的画卖给拍卖人.

sentences.en: Maitland, the auctioneer, put up a pair of vases late that afternoon.
sentences.cn: 那天傍晚,拍买商梅特兰拿出一对花瓶来拍卖.

sentences.en: Smith signaled the auctioneer quietly and kicked the bid up another thousand.
sentences.cn: 史密斯悄悄地向地向拍卖人做手势,然后把出价又抬高了1,000元.

sentences.en: The 1895 work is owned by Norwegian businessman Petter Olsen, whose father Thomas was a friend, neighbor and patron of Munch, the auctioneer said on Tuesday.
sentences.cn: 据拍卖商周二称，这幅1895年创作的名画为挪威商人皮特•奥尔森所有，他的父亲托马斯是蒙克的朋友、邻居和资助人。

sentences.en: The auctioneer asked for an opening bid, but the room was silent.
sentences.cn: 拍卖人开价竞卖, 但房间里一片沉默.

sentences.en: The auctioneer knocked the bureau down to a furniture dealer from York.
sentences.cn: 拍卖者将写字台卖给从约克来的家具商.

sentences.en: The auctioneer pounded his gavel. " Going once, twice, SOLD for $ 10! "
sentences.cn: 拍卖经纪人敲打着槌子: “一次竞标, 两次竞标,十块得标! ”

sentences.en: The auctioneer shall state the drawbacks of auction targets to the bidders.
sentences.cn: 拍卖人应当向竞买人说明拍卖标的的瑕疵.

sentences.en: The auctioneer stated to his audience an item has been bought in.
sentences.cn: 拍卖商向观众表示他已买回自己送去的拍卖品.

sentences.en: The auctioneer was a silver - tongued man from Alabama.
sentences.cn: 那位拍卖商是一位出生于亚拉巴马州的雄辩家.

sentences.en: The eloquent auctioneer smiled at his own ingenuity.
sentences.cn: 能说会道的拍卖商对自己的口才十分赏识.

sentences.en: The most talkative is the least intelligent, and there is hardly a difference between an orator and an auctioneer.
sentences.cn: 话最多的人是最不聪明的人，在一个演说家和一个拍卖人之间，几乎没有分别。

sentences.en: The will was only recently discovered, and is believed to have never been published, an auctioneer told reporters.
sentences.cn: 一位拍卖商对记者说，这份遗嘱是最近才发现的，肯定从未公开发表过。

trans.tran_en: someone who is in charge of selling the things at an auction and who calls out how much money has already been offered for something
